results.title: Pretreatment with high-dose statin, but not low-dose statin, ezetimibe, or the combination of low-dose statin and ezetimibe, limits infarct size in the rat.
results.text_hl: In this article, the @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size-limiting effect of low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin + ezetimibe@@@, @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@, and high-dose statins were compared.

citations.NLM: Birnbaum Y, Lin Y, Ye Y, Merla R, Perez-Polo JR, Uretsky BF. Pretreatment with high-dose statin, but not low-dose statin, ezetimibe, or the combination of low-dose statin and ezetimibe, limits infarct size in the rat. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol Ther. 2008 Mar;13(1):72-9. PMID: 18287593
